text: All the region called Forest of Shadows is under his control
Allies within the token's influence gain increased resistance to physical and magical damage, making them more durable in battle.
Zacharias the Everliving has acquired a collection of powerful and mysterious artifacts over the centuries.
Zacharias the Everliving is on a relentless quest to uncover dark secrets, reclaim lost knowledge, and solidify his unholy power.
Zacharias the Everliving possesses a collection of ancient and mystic scriptures, allows him to tap into the power of these texts, weakening enemy units' magical resistances
Death will come by the hand
It is to the Plain of Bones that a Vampire Lord travels to claim a Zombie Dragon as their mount.
Drawing upon the power of the dragon's blood he consumed, Zacharias is infused with the might of the dragon
